newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israeli police kill Arab at roadblock - radio.
newsitem.headline: Israeli police kill Arab at roadblock - radio.

text.p: Israeli police on Thursday shot dead an Arab who refused an order to stop at a roadblock, Israel's army radio said.

It said police fired in the air to stop a van from running a roadblock near Tel Aviv. Police chased the man who got out and fled on foot and killed him when he refused an order to stop. Israel set up roadblocks to enforce a closure imposed overnight on the West Bank and Gaza Strip for fear of a guerrilla attack.
